200.description: Successful query, returns an array of users

400.description: Invalid request parameters for querying users.

retry-after.description: The amount of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-delimited string of the requested fields per entity. If the 'links' value is omitted, then the entity HATEOAS link will also be omitted.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
The advanced filtering to use for the query. Refer to [RFC 7644](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/rfc7644/) for the syntax. Cannot be combined with any of the fields marked as deprecated. All conditional statements within this query parameter are case insensitive.

The following fields support the `eq` operator: `id`, `subject`, `name`, `email`, `status`, `clientId`, `assignedRoles.id` `assignedRoles.name`, `assignedGroups.id`, `assignedGroupsAssignedRoles.name`

Additionally, the following fields support the `co` operator: `name`, `email`, `subject`

Queries may be rate limited if they differ greatly from these examples:

```
(id eq "62716ab404a7bd8626af9bd6" or id eq "62716ac4c7e500e13ff5fa22") and (status eq "active" or status eq "disabled")
```

```
name co "query" or email co "query" or subject co "query" or id eq "query" or assignedRoles.name eq "query"
```

Any filters for status must be grouped together and applied to the whole query.

Valid:

```
(name eq "Bob" or name eq "Alice") and (status eq "active" or status eq "disabled")
```

Invalid:

```
name eq "Bob" or name eq "Alice" and (status eq "active" or status eq "disabled")
```

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of user entries to retrieve.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Get users that come after this cursor value when sorted. Cannot be used in conjunction with `prev`.

parameters.name: prev
parameters.description: Get users that come before this cursor value when sorted. Cannot be used in conjunction with `next`.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to sort by, with +/- prefix indicating sort order

parameters.name: totalResults
parameters.description: Whether to return a total match count in the result. Defaults to false. It will trigger an extra DB query to count, reducing the efficiency of the endpoint.

get.description: Returns a list of users using cursor-based pagination.

409.description: User conflict when attempting to create a new user.

retry-after.description: The amount of seconds to wait before retrying the request.
The amount of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

parameters.description: A comma-delimited string of the requested fields per entity. If the 'links' value is omitted, then the entity HATEOAS link will also be omitted.

400.description: Invalid request for deleting a user.

get.description: Returns the number of users in a given tenant

400.description: Advanced query filter syntax error or query params format error or filter too complex.

401.description: Unauthorized, JWT invalid or not provided.

403.description: The operation failed due to unsufficient permissions.

retry-after.description: The amount of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-delimited string of the requested fields per entity. If the 'links' value is omitted, then the entity HATEOAS link will also be omitted.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of user entries to retrieve.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Get users with IDs that are higher than the target user ID. Cannot be used in conjunction with prev.

parameters.name: prev
parameters.description: Get users with IDs that are lower than the target user ID. Cannot be used in conjunction with next.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to sort by, with +/- prefix indicating sort order

post.description: Retrieves a list of users matching the filter using an advanced query string.

requestBody.description: Will contain the query filter to apply. It shall not contain more than 100 ids.

post.summary: Invite one or more users by email address.

207.description: Request completed successfully. See Results for ResultDetail on each invite.

Location.description: The URI to the user resource.

retry-after.description: The amount of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

get.description: Redirects to retrieve the user resource associated with the JWT claims.

providerType.description: The provider type of the group

items.description: represents a group entity stored in the database

providerType.description: The type of provider for the group.

AssignedGroupsRefNames.description: An array of group reference names and provider type.

items.description: represents a role entity stored in the database

AssignedRoles.description: An array of role references. Visibility dependant on access level. Must have access to roles to view other users' assigned roles.

AssignedScopes.description: An array of scopes assigned to a user

meta.description: Additional properties relating to the error.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

pointer.description: A JSON Pointer to the property that caused the error.

parameter.description: The URI query parameter that caused the error.

source.description: References to the source of the error.

Error.description: An error object describing the error.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem (if applicable)

errors.description: An array of errors related to the operation.

traceId.description: A unique identifier for tracing the error.

Errors.description: The error response object describing the error from the handling of an HTTP request.

filter.example: (id eq "626949b9017b657805080bbd" or id eq "626949bf017b657805080bbe") and (status eq "active" or status eq "deleted")
filter.description: The advanced filtering to be applied the query. All conditional statements within this query parameter are case insensitive.

Filter.description: An advanced query filter to be used for complex user querying in the tenant.

InviteDataResponse.description: Data list - ResultItem or ErrorItem for each InviteeItem.

code.description: Error code - | HTTP Status code | 1001 - Active User | 1002 - Disabled User | 1003 - Default External Dependency Error |

name.description: Optional display name for this invitee. Example - "Elvis Presley".

email.description: Email address for this invitee. Example - "foo@qlik.com".

resend.description: Flag - when true invite message is sent to inactive or invited users. Typically used to force email resend to users who are not yet active.

language.description: Optional ISO 639-1 2 letter code for invite language. Defaults to 'en' when missing or not found.

invitees.description: List of invitees who should receive an invite email.

op.description: The operation to be performed. The fields `set` and `unset` are deprecated.

path.description: A JSON Pointer. The field `roles` is deprecated.

value.description: The value to be used for this operation.

JSONPatch.description: A JSON Patch document as defined in http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6902.

JSONPatchArray.description: An array of JSON Patch documents

items.description: represents an entity stored in the database

RefIDs.description: An array of entity reference identifiers (e.g. roles, groups).

RefNames.description: An array of reference names (e.g. roles).

status.description: Result status = {"ok" (new user; email sent) | "exists" (existing user; no email sent)}

subject.description: IdP generated UUID for this invitee

email.description: The email address for the user.

status.description: The status of the user within the tenant.

picture.description: A static url linking to the avatar of the user.

subject.description: The unique user identitier from an identity provider.

tenantId.description: The tenant that the user belongs too.

createdAt.description: The timestamp for when the user record was created.

inviteExpiry.description: The Unix timestamp indicating when the invite will expire.

lastUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp for when the user record was last updated.

preferredLocale.description: Represents the end-user's preferred language tag.

preferredZoneinfo.description: Represents the end-user's preferred time zone.

total.description: The total number of users in the tenant.

UserCount.description: The result object for the user count.

email.description: The email address for the user. This is a required field when inviting a user.

status.description: The status of the created user within the tenant.

picture.description: A static url linking to the avatar of the user.

subject.description: The unique user identitier from an identity provider.

tenantId.description: The tenant that the user will belong too.

assignedRoles.description: The roles to assign to the user.

href.description: URL to the next page of records
URL to the previous page of records
URL to the current page of records

totalResults.description: Indicates the total number of matching documents. Will only be returned if the query parameter "totalResults" is true.

region.description: The region the tenant is hosted in

tenant.description: Name of the tenant that will be called
